linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04 or Ubuntu 18.04
  • Processor: x64 architecture with SSE2
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.2+, Vulkan capable
  • Storage: 153 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Sierra 10.12+
  • Processor: x64 architecture with SSE2
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Metal capable Intel and AMD GPUs
  • Storage: 144 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes
  • Additional Notes: Apple officially supported drivers.

name: Jardinains! Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 or 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: x86, x64 architecture with SSE2
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Direct X 10 or higher
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 132 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes
  • Additional Notes: Hardware vendor officially supported drivers.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Bulgarian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Greek, Hungarian, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Portuguese - Brazil, Romanian, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Swedish, Thai, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese
